name: When You Get Stuck in the Matrix
name_original: When You Get Stuck in the Matrix
description:
Jeff has found an opportunity to escape the Matrix! He has to get to the portal while avoiding the bugs caused by the new bodyguard system nicknamed Agent Bob. Based on my YouTube channel Glassedgamer.

Controls:

  • D, A, Left and Right Arrows - move
  • W, Space, Up arrow - jump
  • F - skip level

Created for the #GitHubGameOff 2021.
